# MPAdTimeRange

**Class**

An object that represents a time range where an ad break exists in the current player.

## Declaration

```swift
class MPAdTimeRange
```

## Overview

This value must be in bounds of the duration of the current player item.

## Creating an Ad Time Range

- **init(_:)**: Creates a Media Player time range that indicates where an ad break exists in the current player.

## Inspecting an Ad Time Range

- **timeRange**: A Media Player time range that indicates where an ad break exists in the current player.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
